dialogs.description: Calling a business to ask for directions

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hi, I'm trying to get to your store. Can you give me directions?

lines.speaker: Business
lines.text: Yes, of course. We're located on Main Street. If you're coming from the highway, take the exit for Main Street and head east for about a mile.

dialogs.description: Asking for directions to a business over the phone

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hello, I need to get to your office. Can you provide me with directions?

lines.speaker: Business
lines.text: Certainly. Our office is located in the downtown area. If you're using a GPS, our address is 123 Main Street. If you're coming from the north, take the highway and exit at Main Street.
